TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Spin extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains classes that provide objects for the arrows of a spin button control (also known as an up-down control). This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Spin> class provides a foundation in which the following classes are defined:
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Spin.Down>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Spin.DownHorizontal>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Spin.Up>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Spin.UpHorizontal>
Each of these classes provides one or more properties that return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for each state of the spin button arrow specified by the class name.
